Chinese spies hacked Dutch defence network last year - intelligence agenciesChinese state-backed cyber spies gained access to a Dutch military network last year, Dutch intelligence agencies said on Tuesday, calling it part of a trend of Chinese political espionage against the Netherlands and its allies. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 14:47:22 GMT 4H2LY3RECNJITFAAHII32BJLZ4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/china-cyber-spies-hacked-computers-dutch-defence-ministry-report-2024-02-06/James Pearson, Anthony Deutsch技术网络安全
China expresses concerns to U.S. over tariffs, sanctions in Beijing talksChina's financial officials expressed concerns to visiting U.S. Treasury officials about U.S. tariffs, investment restrictions and sanctions set up to "suppress" Chinese companies, the Chinese finance ministry said on Tuesday. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 13:53:12 GMT ARUZIPGS6RPDRBVM7FMV2QFIU4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-expresses-concerns-us-over-tariffs-sanctions-beijing-talks-2024-02-06/Reuters世界中国
With solar industry in crisis, Europe in a bind over Chinese importsEurope's green energy transition is stuck between a rock and a hard place. A flood of cheap Chinese solar panel imports is driving record solar energy installations. But those same imports are crushing Europe's few local solar manufacturers. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 12:41:43 GMT O3FJY4AJRBMVVBHCOIZR5WUWPU https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/with-solar-industry-crisis-europe-bind-over-chinese-imports-2024-02-06/Kate Abnett, Nina Chestney可持续发展气候与能源
Exclusive: Russia's Novatek sets up China office to market gas amid sanctions- sourcesRussian natural gas producer Novatek is building a new China-based team to explore marketing the fuel, sources familiar with the plans said, as U.S. sanctions thwart plans for exports from its new multi-billion dollar Arctic project. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 11:23:17 GMT FOULWZMGE5KNJD7FS62IJQV4QM https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/Russias-novatek-sets-up-china-office-market-gas-amid-sanctions-sources-2024-02-06/Chen Aizhu, Vladimir Soldatkin商业活力
Volkswagen's Audi cuts output at Brussels plant due to parts shortageVolkswagen's luxury car brand Audi has reduced output at its Brussels plant, where it produces the Q8 e-tron model, for at least two weeks due to component shortages, a spokesperson said on Tuesday. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 11:11:55 GMT S6MAPBUKRFKEXFRXMKEEFMIX4M https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/volkswagens-audi-reduces-output-brussels-plant-automobilwoche-2024-02-06/Reuters商业汽车与交通
